alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 11:56AM CDT until March 12 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL HOUSTON...WESTERN MILLER... NORTHWESTERN BAKER AND EARLY COUNTIES... At 1255 PM EDT/1155 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blakely to 13 miles northwest of Colquitt to 7 miles southeast of Columbia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Blakely, Ashford, Douglasville, Centerville, Gordon, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Howards Mill, Crestview, Mayhaw, Cuba, Killarney, Enterprise, Harmony Church Rd/hwy 45, Farley Nuclear Plant, Cedar Springs, Old Damascus, Jeterville and Hentown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
